abstract: Brazil deploys 220,000 troops to help in battle against Zika virus, mosquito-borne conditions that has been linked to severe birth defects of thousands of infants.
lead_paragraph: The move to deploy 220,000 troops for a day next month came as an official said the country was “badly losing the battle” against diseases like Zika.

headline.main: Brazil Will Deploy Troops to Spread Awareness of Zika Virus
headline.print_headline: Brazil to Deploy Troops With Leaflets on Virus

snippet: The move to deploy 220,000 troops for a day next month came as an official said the country was “badly losing the battle” against diseases like Zika.
